function.name: MetaClone
deepcopy
function.summary: function commonlib.deepcopy(object) code from: http://lua-users.org/wiki/CopyTable This function returns a deep copy of a given table. The function below also copies the metatable to the new table if there is one, so the behaviour of the copied table is the same as the original. But the 2 tables share the same metatable, you can avoid this by changing this 'getmetatable(object)' to '_copy( getmetatable(object) )'.

function.name: copy
function.summary: function commonlib.copy(object) same as commonlib.clone except that it does not copy meta table.

function.name: partialcopy
mincopy
partialcompare
function.summary: function commonlib.partialcompare(dest, src, tolerance) this function simply does, dest = src, but it copies value from src to dest. It is mostly used with tables.It only copies src field to dest field, if src field name does not exist in dest. In other words, dest will preserve all its named fields plus additional fields in dest compares all fields in src with destination, value by value, if they are equal, true is returned. otherwise, return nil or false. Note that if dest has more fields than src, yet all src fields equals to dest, then it will still return true. Note: it also compare indexed array items @param tolerance: if not nil, it will be used to compare number type values. smaller than this will be regarded as equal.
function.parameter: if not nil, it will be used to compare number type values. smaller than this will be regarded as equal.

function.name: partialfields
function.summary: function commonlib.partialfields(dest, src, fields) compare all fields in dest with src and return true if equal.

function.name: compare
function.parameter: if not nil, it will be used to compare number type values. smaller than this will be regarded as equal.
function.returns: return if equal.

function.name: ClearTextureCache
function.summary: function ParaAsset.ClearTextureCache() clear all cached textures.

function.name: SyncRemoteTexture
function.summary:
function ParaAsset.SyncRemoteTexture(FileUrl)
This function is only used internally. It is called automatically when the ParaEngine Core detects that a texture is a remote texture. @note: One shall never call this function explicitly. In scripting interface, we can call ParaAsset.LoadRemoteTexture() instead Load a texture from remote file. It first checks if the file is available from the local texture cache, if yes, it will immediately use the local copy, before refreshing from the network. In either case, a thread is used to synchronize with the remote server. The only exception is that the filename contains a CRC32 parameter, where the remote sync is skipped if CRC match.

function.name: SyncRemoteTexture_callback
function.summary: function ParaAsset.SyncRemoteTexture_callback(FileUrl, DestFolder)

function.name: LoadRemoteTexture
function.parameter: http texture note3: crc32 code can be appended to file name, so that the same file does not need to be downloaded multiple times if local and server version match. such as "http://www.paraengine.com/images/index_12.png?CRC32=0".
while filename is being downloaded, this texture will be used.
function.returns: return texture is returned.

function.summary: function ToolBase:DisconnectSender(srcSender) disconnect all connections from a given sender

function.name: sender
function.summary:
function ToolBase:sender() Returns a pointer to the object that sent the signal, if called in a slot activated by a signal; otherwise it returns 0. The pointer is valid only during the execution of the slot that calls this function from this object's thread context.
The pointer returned by this function becomes invalid if the sender is destroyed, or if the slot is disconnected from the sender's signal. @warning This function violates the object-oriented principle of modularity. However, getting access to the sender might be useful when many signals are connected to a single slot.

function.name: Activate
function.parameter: usually self. if used as a member function.

function.name: ConnectNotify
function.summary: function ToolBase:ConnectNotify(signal) This virtual function is called when something has been connected to a signal in this object. warning This function violates the object-oriented principle of modularity. However, it might be useful for optimizing access to expensive resources.

function.name: DisconnectNotify
function.summary: function ToolBase:DisconnectNotify(signal) This virtual function is called when something has been disconnected from a signal in this object. warning This function violates the object-oriented principle of modularity. However, it might be useful for optimizing access to expensive resources.

function.name: dumpObjectInfo

function.name: installEventFilter
function.summary: function ToolBase:installEventFilter(obj) Installs an event filter obj on this object. filter is like the hook chain An event filter is an object that receives all events that are sent to this object. The filter can either stop the event or forward it to this object. The event filter obj receives events via its eventFilter() function. The eventFilter() function must return true if the event should be filtered, (i.e. stopped); otherwise it must return false. If multiple event filters are installed on a single object, the filter that was installed last is activated first.

function.name: removeEventFilter
function.summary: function ToolBase:removeEventFilter(obj) Removes an event filter object obj from this object. The request is ignored if such an event filter has not been installed. All event filters for this object are automatically removed when this object is destroyed. It is always safe to remove an event filter, even during event filter activation (i.e. from the eventFilter() function).

function.name: filterEvent
function.returns: return if event is stopped by one of the filtered objects.

function.name: eventFilter
function.summary: function ToolBase:eventFilter(object, event) virtual function: Filters events if this object has been installed as an event filter for the watched object. In your reimplementation of this function, if you want to filter the event out, i.e. stop it being handled further, return true; otherwise return false. @sa installEventFilter()

function.name: DrawTextScaled
function.parameter: text scale. if nil or 1, it is same as DrawText()

function.name: DrawTextScaledEx
function.summary: function painter:DrawTextScaledEx(x, y, width, height, text, alignment, scale) Set the text align and other text displaying formats @param alignment: It can be any combination of the following values. DT_BOTTOM (0x00000008) Justifies the text to the bottom of the rectangle. This value must be combined with DT_SINGLELINE. DT_CALCRECT (0x00000400) Determines the width and height of the rectangle. If there are multiple lines of text, ID3DXFont::DrawText uses the width of the rectangle pointed to by the pRect parameter and extends the base of the rectangle to bound the last line of text. If there is only one line of text, ID3DXFont::DrawText modifies the right side of the rectangle so that it bounds the last character in the line. In either case, ID3DXFont::DrawText returns the height of the formatted text but does not draw the text. DT_CENTER (0x00000001) Centers text horizontally in the rectangle. DT_EXPANDTABS (0x00000040) Expands tab characters. The default number of characters per tab is eight. DT_LEFT (0x00000000) Aligns text to the left. DT_NOCLIP (0x00000100) Draws without clipping. ID3DXFont::DrawText is somewhat faster when DT_NOCLIP is used. DT_RIGHT (0x00000002) Aligns text to the right. DT_RTLREADING Displays text in right-to-left reading order for bi-directional text when a Hebrew or Arabic font is selected. The default reading order for all text is left-to-right. DT_SINGLELINE (0x00000020) Displays text on a single line only. Carriage returns and line feeds do not break the line. DT_TOP (0x00000000) Top-justifies text. DT_VCENTER (0x00000004) Centers text vertically (single line only). DT_WORDBREAK (0x00000010) Breaks words. Lines are automatically broken between words if a word would extend past the edge of the rectangle specified by the pRect parameter. A carriage return/line feed sequence also breaks the line.
function.parameter: It can be any combination of the following values. DT_BOTTOM (0x00000008) Justifies the text to the bottom of the rectangle. This value must be combined with DT_SINGLELINE. DT_CALCRECT (0x00000400) Determines the width and height of the rectangle. If there are multiple lines of text, ID3DXFont::DrawText uses the width of the rectangle pointed to by the pRect parameter and extends the base of the rectangle to bound the last line of text. If there is only one line of text, ID3DXFont::DrawText modifies the right side of the rectangle so that it bounds the last character in the line. In either case, ID3DXFont::DrawText returns the height of the formatted text but does not draw the text. DT_CENTER (0x00000001) Centers text horizontally in the rectangle. DT_EXPANDTABS (0x00000040) Expands tab characters. The default number of characters per tab is eight. DT_LEFT (0x00000000) Aligns text to the left. DT_NOCLIP (0x00000100) Draws without clipping. ID3DXFont::DrawText is somewhat faster when DT_NOCLIP is used. DT_RIGHT (0x00000002) Aligns text to the right. DT_RTLREADING Displays text in right-to-left reading order for bi-directional text when a Hebrew or Arabic font is selected. The default reading order for all text is left-to-right. DT_SINGLELINE (0x00000020) Displays text on a single line only. Carriage returns and line feeds do not break the line. DT_TOP (0x00000000) Top-justifies text. DT_VCENTER (0x00000004) Centers text vertically (single line only). DT_WORDBREAK (0x00000010) Breaks words. Lines are automatically broken between words if a word would extend past the edge of the rectangle specified by the pRect parameter. A carriage return/line feed sequence also breaks the line.

function.name: sizeEvent
function.summary: function UIElement:sizeEvent(event) The resize event is called whenever the window is resized in the windowing system, either directly through the windowing system acknowledging a setGeometry() or resize() request, or indirectly through the user resizing the window manually.

function.name: repaint
function.summary: function UIElement:repaint() force repaint in the next frame.

function.name: update
function.summary: function UIElement:update() Updates the widget unless updates are disabled or the widget is hidden. This function does not cause an immediate repaint; instead it schedules a paint event for processing when system returns to the main event loop. This permits us to optimize for more speed and less flicker than a call to repaint() does. Calling update() several times normally results in just one paintEvent() call.

function.name: Pick
function.parameter: , y: if nil, it is the current mouse position.
, height: if nil, 1,1
viewport index, if -1 it means the current viewport.
function.returns: return of picking result. if nil means nothing is picked.

function.name: GetPickingResult
function.summary: function BufferPicking:GetPickingResult() return an array of unique picking id in the last pick call. it may return nil if nothing is picked

function.name: GetPickingCount
function.summary: function BufferPicking:GetPickingCount() return the number of objects picked.

function.name: GetPickingID
function.parameter: if -1, it will use m_currentPickIndex;

function.name: ClearPickingResult
function.summary: function BufferPicking:ClearPickingResult() clear last picking result

function.summary: function BufferPicking:SetResultDirty(bDirty)

function.name: GetViewport
function.summary: function BufferPicking:GetViewport() in which viewport to pick. default to -1, which is the default one.

function.name: SetViewport
function.summary: function BufferPicking:SetViewport(nViewportIndex) in which viewport to pick. if -1, it is the default one.

DrawCube
function.parameter: if true (default), we will emulate a cube by drawing only 8 triangles, instead of 12. when no shading

function.name: DrawLine
function.summary: function ShapesDrawer.DrawLine(painter, from_x,from_y,from_z, to_x, to_y, to_z) draw a line

function.name: DrawCircle
function.parameter: "x", "y", "z". perpendicular to which axis
if true (default to nil), we will fill the circle with current brush
if nil, we will automatically determine segment by radius.
default to 0;
default to 2*math.pi;
default to 0.

function.summary: function ShapesDrawer.DrawArrowHead(painter, cx,cy,cz, axis, radius, length, segment) draw arrow head

function.name: ctor
function.summary: function request:ctor()

function.name: GetResponse
function.summary: function request:GetResponse() get the response object.

function.name: GetNid
function.summary: function request:GetNid() get the nid where the request is from.

function.name: errorEvent
function.summary: function request:errorEvent(msg)

function.name: tostring
function.summary: function request:tostring()

function.name: redirect
function.summary: function request:redirect(d)

function.name: url
function.summary: function request:url() original request url

function.name: parse_url
function.summary: function request:parse_url()

function.name: GetMsg
getparams
IsJsonBody
function.summary: function request:IsJsonBody()

function.name: GetHost
function.summary: function request:GetHost() get host name from header. usually checking for the http origin for cross-domain request or not.

function.name: GetMethod
function.summary: function request:GetMethod() in headers 'GET', 'HEAD', 'POST', 'PUT', 'OPTIONS' etc

function.name: header
function.parameter: "method", "Host", or any of other custom header fields

function.name: get
function.parameter: if name is nil or 'json', we will return table object passed in from headers.body (json http post) if you post data as json, you can also access json encoded html body directly with key name.

function.name: getpeername
function.summary: function request:getpeername() get ip address as string

function.name: discard
send
function.summary: function request:send(address) send/route the request to another processor: possibly another npl file in another thread or another machine.

function.name: get_cookie
function.parameter: if nil, entire cookies table is returned. if string, only cookies value of the given name is returned.

function.name: clear_cookie
function.summary: function request:clear_cookie() clear all cookies in case of rpc request, etc.

function.name: NormalizeHeaders
function.summary: function request:NormalizeHeaders(headers) from case insensitive to case sensitive.

function.name: init
ctor
function.summary: function response:ctor()

function.name: init
function.summary: function response:init(req) response can be reused by calling this function.

function.name: send_xml
function.parameter: xml/html root node or text.
nil if default to "ok"(200)

function.name: send_json
function.parameter: nil if default to "ok"(200)

function.name: SetReturnCode
function.summary: function response:SetReturnCode(return_code)

function.name: nocache_headers
function.summary: function response:nocache_headers() Set the headers to prevent caching for the different browsers. Different browsers support different nocache headers, so several headers must be sent so that all of them get the point that no caching should occur.

function.name: set_header
function.summary: function response:set_header(h, v) it will replace value

function.name: add_header
function.summary: function response:add_header(h, v) there can be duplicated names

function.name: SetContent
function.summary: function response:SetContent(text) if one calls SetContent instead of send(), any previously buffered send text will be ignored.

function.name: send
function.parameter: by default, empty table is serialized to json as object {}. calling this function will be serialized to json as array[]

function.name: status
function.summary: function response:status(code) set return code and return response object.

function.name: sendsome
function.parameter: string or a table of text lines.

function.name: isContentTypePlainText
function.summary: function response:isContentTypePlainText(contentType)

function.name: send_response
function.summary: function response:send_response() sends prebuilt content to the client if possible, sets Content-Length: header field uses: self.content : content data to send sets: self.keep_alive : if possible to keep using the same connection

function.name: send_headers
function.summary: function response:send_headers() sends the response headers directly to client uses: self.sent_headers : if true, headers are already sent, does nothing self.statusline : response status, if nil, sends 200 OK self.headers : table of header fields to send

function.name: send_data
function.parameter: content data to send

function.name: set_cookie
function.summary: function response:set_cookie(name, value)

function.name: redirect
function.summary: function response:redirect(path)

function.name: delete_cookie
function.summary: function response:delete_cookie(name, path)

function.name: discard
SetOnFinished
function.summary: function response:SetOnFinished(callbackFunc) set on finished callback

function.name: SetFinished
function.summary: function response:SetFinished() call this to actually make this request finished. It will invoke OnFinished callback.

function.name: finish
function.summary: function response:finish() call this function to actually send cached response to client. this function is automatically called when page handler is finished. Please note, calling finish() between Begin() and End() has no effect.

function.name: Begin
function.summary: function response:Begin() we will enter asynchronous mode, and the response is sent when self:End() is called. Please note, it is up to you, to call End() function. Forgetting doing so, the client will no longer receive any response from current connection. For example, in the page handler, we may wait for another async http call, before calling End().

function.name: End
function.parameter: if true, we will not call finish to send the actual response. default to nil.

function.name: GetNid
function.summary: function response:GetNid()

function.name: GetAddress
function.summary: function response:GetAddress()

function.name: CloseAfterSend
function.summary: function response:CloseAfterSend()

function.name: sendInternal
function.summary: function response:sendInternal(text) private:

function.name: new
function.summary: function npl_page_env:new(request, response) expose: request, response, echo and print to npl script.

function.name: push_page
function.summary: function npl_page_env:push_page(page) internal function: never call this in page code

function.name: pop_page
function.summary: function npl_page_env:pop_page(page) internal function: never call this in page code

function.name: print
function.summary: function npl_page_env.print(...) same as self.echo(string.format(...))

function.name: nplinfo
exit
function.parameter: output this message. usually nil.

function.name: dirname
function.parameter: if nil, self.__FILE__ is used.

function.name: getfilepath
function.summary:
function npl_page_env.getfilepath(filename)
@param filename: file path, relative or absolute. begin with './', relative to current file begin with '/', relative to web root directory begin with '../../../', up several directory to current file no "/" in filename, relative to current file otherwise, filename is absolute path.
function.parameter: file path, relative or absolute. begin with './', relative to current file begin with '/', relative to web root directory begin with '../../../', up several directory to current file no "/" in filename, relative to current file otherwise, filename is absolute path.

function.name: file_exists
function.summary: function npl_page_env.file_exists(filename) Checks whether a file exists

function.name: include
function.parameter: if no parent directory is specified, we will assume it is from the containing file's parent directory. if filename begins with "/", it will append the web root directory.
true to reload the file. default to nil. files will be loaded only once.
function.returns: return result of the included function.

function.name: include_once
function.summary: function npl_page_env.include_once(filename) same as include(), expect that this function only takes effect on first call for a given env.

function.name: include_pagecode
function.parameter: the actual code string to include.
nil to default to current file. only used for displaying error

function.name: site_url
function.summary: function npl_page_env.site_url(filename, scheme) return the site url like http://localhost:8080/

function.name: site_config
function.summary:
function npl_page_env.site_config(name)
@param name: if nil, the root config table is returned.
function.parameter: if nil, the root config table is returned.

function.name: addheader
function.summary: function npl_page_env.addheader(name, value) add header, only possible when header is not sent yet.

function.name: setheader
function.summary: function npl_page_env.setheader(name, value) set header (replace previously set values), only possible when header is not sent yet.

function.name: log
function.summary: function npl_page_env.log(...) simple log any object, same as echo.

function.name: sanitize
function.summary: function npl_page_env.sanitize(text) Sanitizes all HTML tags

function.name: json_encode
function.parameter: by default, empty table is serialized to json as object {}. calling this function will be serialized to json as array []

function.name: json_decode
function.summary: function npl_page_env.json_decode(value) json decode

function.name: xml_encode
function.summary: function npl_page_env.xml_encode(value) Returns a string containing the Xml representation of value.

function.name: get_file_text
function.summary: function npl_page_env.get_file_text(filename) get file text

function.name: yield
function.parameter: if true, this function will handle error
function.returns: return , msg: err is true if there is error.

function.name: gettable
function.parameter: table names like "models.users"

function.name: createtable
function.parameter: table names like "models.users"

function.parameter: string or number or nil or boolean.
